results.content: Just a few errors while demonstrating certain code. Would be nice to troubleshoot rather than just review code looking for errors as troubleshooting is skill on its own. Also, one element would be styling the form fields with something, like red borders or red fill when they are invalid.

results.content: This course helped me a lot, but I would like two changes: move the link to the code repo to the beginning of the course. I think the code should be provided for three versions of the signup form: the one without the Formik wrapper, the one with the Formik wrapper but without the object schema validation, and the final form. That would have helped me get through the course quicker.

results.content: It's very basic, I was looking for something more in depth.  I really didn't learn anything I didn't already know from reading the official docs.

response.content:
Thanks Sean for the feedback,
I've already noted that in the introduction, and in the target audience that this course only for beginners. I'm sorry to hear that this course it's not what you looking for. But i'm planning to add more sections about how to use formik with hooks, and i hope by that you will find what you looking for.
